svg.title: Backend Flow: Admin Dashboard & User Management (app.py)

g.text: Backend Flow: Admin Dashboard & User Management (app.py)
Scenario: Admin logs in, views dashboard stats,
and promotes a user to Manager role.
SELECT id, email, name, avatar, role, google_token...
SELECT id, email, name, role, created_at...
UPDATE users SET role='manager' WHERE id=?
